doctrine: Forgive yourself. Shame is chemical
Show up everyday (it's honorable)
Note last night’s bedtime
Read yesterday’s journal
Review yesterday’s trades
The now in Motivewave chooses where to engage
The now in Bookmap chooses where to execute
The regime and tape choose the target type
Focus on the now for signal
Environments matter, chaos breeds chaos. Trade calm
Run cadence loop: The 7, market map, email
Leaks are a chemical event. Debrief why and create a rule
Witness distortions. See reality
Size is earned instead of imagined
Single lots for rhythm and limited exposure, +1 lot on permission
Press when green
Globex owns the night. Make instead of trade: ops, art, design
Globex wants to bargain. Deals with self cost time, money and emotion
Hero trades are signal
If both sides lose, stand down
Attack at edges and breathe
Every score is data for improvement
PnL is execution points. 1EXP = 1USD
Draw a clean sheet and accept it
Draw a red sheet and accept it
Draws days together. It’s a campaign
Trust yourself. Returns cost time, money, and emotion
Stretch and sync with nature
Journal leftie thru-out
Vlog and review sessions
Regulate with music, movies and the daily worksheet
Survival > PnL
Use accounts for lessons and new rules instead of shame
Obey prime
